structures

Class CircularShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Body, GoalPost, MovableCircularShape, WarpPoint

    public abstract class CircularShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction for any object that is to be drawn in a circular way. Supports the geometry of the shape, drawing the shape, and changing the values of the Geometry variables.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

      • draw

        public void draw(double dx,
        double dy,
        java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the shape with the shape's default color. This is the primary method for all drawing.
        Parameters:
        dx - a translation x-difference
        dy - a translation y-difference
        g - the Graphics component to draw with

        public final void setRadius(int radius)

        Parameters:

      • intersects

        public final boolean intersects(CircularShape circle)
        Returns if this intersects another CircularShape. Touching on the edge (i.e. there is a single point of collision) is not considered an intersection, so this case returns false.
        Parameters:
        circle - another shape
        Returns:
        true if they overlap, false otherwise
